issue.title: [C++] Fix CPU cache size detection on macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9110](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9110). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Running certain benchmarks on macOS never ends because CpuInfo detects the RAM size as  the size of L1 cache.
